pages.text: While a number of entries will be available to you immediately upon obtaining this book, further entries will be unlocked upon obtaining new ingredients or crafting new equipment.$(br2)If you are ever lost for something to do, revisit old entries and ensure you've tried out new ingredients, new spells & new rituals.

Keep an eye for a right-facing arrow in the bottom-right corner of the book, which both indicates that there are additional pages to this entry, and allows you to navigate to the next page.$(br2)You can also use the mouse scroll-wheel to flip pages between pages, and right-click anywhere in addition to clicking the back arrow to return to the previous section.
